import React, { useContext } from "react"; // CONTEXT import { EssentialsContext } from "../context/ProjectsContext"; import "../App.css"; function About() { const { artImg } = useContext(EssentialsContext); return (

About

hello! My name is NELSON

I'm a self-taught FrontEnd Developer and Graphic Designer from Nigeria. I'm obsessed with creating dynamic user experiences and making them accessible to everyone. My interest in Designing began in 2019 and since then, I have been able to make great strides in my career path. For me, Designing is more than just putting things in place to be viewed, it's my lifestyle. With the right amount of inspiration and consistency, I'm able to make a real impact in my work.

Skill set:

HTML / Css javaScript (ES6+) React React Native
FIGMA After Effect Adobe illustrator Adobe Photoshop
Instagram Twitter GitHub
); } export default About;
